text: This class defines no new functions on top of DRAgent . It is the superclass for all real-time agents. A real-time agent receiving raw data can create a task from it and schedule it for decoding. See the real-time environment. The following sequence diagram shows in which order methods are called for the real-time agent. Open Sequence diagram for DRRealtimeAgent For a real-time collection agent example, see: com.digitalroute.devkit.examples.tcpcollection.*
title: DRRealtimeAgent - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
